segments.text: I see the angled view of this busy kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman stands facing the plate she's drying.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Unbeknownst to her, the sink is overflowing behind.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water sheets down, pooling around her unaware feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The curtains are tied back, letting in daylight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Through the window, the garden path and bushes are neat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the kids are causing potential havoc inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy on the wobbly stool, reaching for cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl assisting by waiting with open hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're defying the rules in this sneaky way.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If he falls, it could be serious with the slippery floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stacked dishes might topple too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene mixes innocence with real danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish the mother would notice and stop it all.
segments.speaker: PAR
